title: 1088-A
statement: A. Ehab and another construction problemtime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputGiven an integer $$$x$$$, find 2 integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ such that:$$$1 \\le a,b \\le x$$$$$$b$$$ divides $$$a$$$ ($$$a$$$ is divisible by $$$b$$$).$$$a \\cdot b>x$$$.$$$\\frac{a}{b}<x$$$.InputThe only line contains the integer $$$x$$$ $$$(1 \\le x \\le 100)$$$.OutputYou should output two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$, satisfying the given conditions, separated by a space. If no pair of integers satisfy the conditions above, print "-1" (without quotes).ExamplesInput10Output6 3Input1Output-1
